name: OrbitRift
description:
Orbit Rift is a Top Down shooter that is based around a planet with one objective to mine for resources and gain points to defeat the opposite team to win the game. The gameplay is based on a planet while fending off horde of AI that that will try to destroy you and your enemy.  Traveling around the planets surface in an 3d plane moving between lakes and mountains trying to get to the enemy player mine or defending yours. 

Current build objective:

Collect 29 orbs around the planet with in 30 seconds to win the game!

follow us at twitter: https://twitter.com/OrbitRift
